description:
Go forth with the technical wizardry of Patagonia® fabrics. This lightweight material is the same used for grown-up base layers. With lots of coverage and a nice deep hood, the Capilene Cool Daily Hoodie makes a great base layer on cool days.Made of polyester and recycled polyester.Heathered fabrics are 50% recycled, solids are 100% recycled.Deep hood adds sun coverage.HeiQ® Fresh treatment.miDori™ bioSoft finish improves wicking and softnessMinimal seams reduce chafing and improve mobility.Fair Trade Certified sewing.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade
name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Daily Sun Hoody - Girls' - Children to Youths

Fabric content: Fabrics vary; see product descriptionFabrics vary; see product description
